column5: I wanted to take the kids to the river for some crappie, but the rivers a little muddy right now. Any trout ponds around the cambridge area? Ive looked but this stupid computer keeps giving me Durham and Owensound area  .  Thanks in advance,  Colin
New Dundee has Lyndon Trout farm at the corner of Huron Rd and Queen St. If you teach em to flyfish you'll save some money http://www.lyndonfishhatcheries.com/publicfishing/pricing.html
oh ya.  total brain fart today.
